title: Designing Online Project-Based Learning for Solving Complex Social Problems at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sociological theory and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners, as general citizens with some practical experience in community issues, require improved systematic analytical skills for complex social scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement specific social problem-solving strategies according to the three levels of situational complexity (basic/intermediate/advanced).
Learners can critically analyze their problem-solving approaches and derive improvement strategies through formative assessment tasks.
Learners can develop criteria to evaluate the impact of decision-making in social contexts based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
